properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT Service AS s JOIN lnkCustomerContractToService AS l1 ON l1.service_id=s.id JOIN CustomerContract AS cc ON l1.customercontract_id=cc.id WHERE cc.org_id = :this->org_id AND s.status != 'obsolete'
SELECT ServiceSubcategory WHERE service_id = :this->service_id AND (ISNULL(:this->request_type) OR request_type = :this->request_type) AND status != 'obsolete'
SELECT UserRequest WHERE id != :this->id AND status NOT IN ('rejected','resolved','closed')

method.comment: /** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() and SetElapsedTime() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentUser() instead * @return void */
/** * Cascade the resolution to child User Request * @return true (returning false would stop the ongoing transition) */
/** * Resolve the ticket from another resolved ticket * @return void */

dashlet.title: Organization:Overview:UserRequests
dashlet.subtitle: Menu:UserRequest:OpenRequests
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE status != "closed" AND org_id=:this->id

dashlet.title: Organization:Overview:MyUserRequests
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest AS i WHERE i.agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed", "resolved") AND org_id=:this->id

dashlet.title: UI:WelcomeMenu:MyCalls
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest AS i WHERE i.agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed", "resolved")

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-RequestByType-last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-Last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByStatus
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByAgent
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByType
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-RequestManagementOverview-OpenRequestByCustomer
dashlet.query: SELECT UserRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

menu.oql: SELECT UserRequest WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed","resolved")
SELECT UserRequest WHERE status IN ("escalated_tto", "escalated_ttr") OR escalation_flag="yes"
SELECT UserRequest WHERE status NOT IN ("closed")
SELECT UserRequest WHERE caller_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed")

item.oql: SELECT FCI, R FROM FunctionalCI AS FCI JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToTicket AS L ON L.functionalci_id = FCI.id JOIN UserRequest AS R ON L.ticket_id = R.id WHERE (R.status NOT IN ('closed', 'resolved')) AND (R.request_type='incident') AND (L.impact_code != 'not_impacted') AND (R.id != :this->id)

SELECT FCI, R FROM FunctionalCI AS FCI JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToTicket AS L ON L.functionalci_id = FCI.id JOIN UserRequest AS R ON L.ticket_id = R.id WHERE (R.status NOT IN ('closed', 'resolved')) AND (R.request_type='incident') AND (L.impact_code != 'not_impacted') AND (R.id != :this->id)

SELECT FCI, R FROM FunctionalCI AS FCI JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToTicket AS L ON L.functionalci_id = FCI.id JOIN UserRequest AS R ON L.ticket_id = R.id WHERE (R.status NOT IN ('closed', 'resolved')) AND (R.request_type='incident') AND (L.impact_code != 'not_impacted')

SELECT FCI, R FROM FunctionalCI AS FCI JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToTicket AS L ON L.functionalci_id = FCI.id JOIN UserRequest AS R ON L.ticket_id = R.id WHERE (R.status NOT IN ('closed', 'resolved')) AND (R.request_type='incident') AND (L.impact_code != 'not_impacted')
